meanings.definition: Cooked on a grill over an open flame.
meanings.sent1: The chargrilled burger had a delicious smoky flavor.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served chargrilled chicken with a side of vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The chargrilled steak was so tasty, it made the other dishes jealous.
meanings.sent4: The chargrilled aroma filled the air, enticing everyone nearby.
meanings.sent5: The chargrilled vegetables were a colorful and flavorful addition to the meal.

meanings.definition: To cook (food) on a grill over an open flame.
meanings.sent1: We chargrilled the sausages for the barbecue.
meanings.sent2: She chargrilled the fish to perfection, making it a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The chef chargrilled the steak with such skill that it seemed to dance on the grill.
meanings.sent4: The flames below the grill chargrilled the meat with a fiery passion.
meanings.sent5: The friends gathered around the chargrilled food, eager to taste the smoky goodness.
